analysis:
The job responsibilities and skills focus on advanced research and engineering in distributed systems, autonomous systems, and AIoT business domains such as autonomous driving, industrial automation, and robotics. The responsibilities include enabling Cloud and Edge powered Embodied AI solutions, collaborating on scalable and distributed autonomous systems research, and implementing research results to solve real-world challenges. The skills required include proficiency in programming languages like Rust, C++, and Python, experience with autonomous system architectures, middleware frameworks, and AI inferencing and training using machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch.

While the job involves AI and machine learning, there is no specific mention of working with Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs). The focus is more on autonomous systems, distributed systems, and AIoT solutions rather than on natural language processing or generation tasks typically associated with GenAI or LLMs.
